description: portrait of a man with scraggly black beard, wearing patterned headscarf with a cap perched on top; man has bulbous nose and large wart on PR cheek; photo heavily worked over with charcoal--has the appearance of a drawing; verso:  sketch (or tracing)--mirror image of recto image; unfinished look
marks:

on back of moun below image on mount, in pencil: [Old Scrooge  Wm
title: Old Scrooge
